com.ning.billing.meter.timeline.codec
Class DefaultSampleCoder

java.lang.Object
  com.ning.billing.meter.timeline.codec.DefaultSampleCoder
All Implemented Interfaces:
SampleCoder
public class DefaultSampleCoder
extends Object
implements SampleCoder

Instances of this class encode sample streams. In addition, this class contains a collection of static methods providing lower-level encoding plumbing

encodeSample

public void encodeSample(DataOutputStream outputStream,
                         SampleBase sample)
This method writes the binary encoding of the sample to the outputStream. This encoding is the form saved in the db and scanned when read from the db.

Specified by:
encodeSample in interface SampleCoder
Parameters:
outputStream - the stream to which bytes should be written
sample - the sample to be written

encodeScalarValue

public void encodeScalarValue(DataOutputStream outputStream,
                              SampleOpcode opcode,
                              Object value)
Output the scalar value into the output stream

Specified by:
encodeScalarValue in interface SampleCoder
Parameters:
outputStream - the stream to which bytes should be written
value - the sample value, interpreted according to the opcode

compressSample

public ScalarSample compressSample(ScalarSample sample)
This routine returns a ScalarSample that may have a smaller representation than the ScalarSample argument. In particular, if tries hard to choose the most compact representation of double-precision values.

Specified by:
compressSample in interface SampleCoder
Parameters:
sample - A ScalarSample to be compressed
Returns:
Either the same ScalarSample is that input, for for some cases of opcode DOUBLE, a more compact ScalarSample which when processed returns a double value.

public void scan(TimelineChunk chunk,
                 SampleProcessor processor)
          throws IOException
This invokes the processor on the values in the timeline bytes.

scan in interface SampleCoder
